channel.title: CVE Feed for Device42 -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Device42 -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-1401|2024-09-17T02:11:37.189Z -- device42 -- cmdb
item.description: Improper Access Control vulnerability in the /Exago/WrImageResource.adx route as used in Device42 Asset Management Appliance allows an unauthenticated attacker to read sensitive server files with root permissions. This issue affects: Device42 CMDB versions prior to 18.01.00.
